value.title: DAX Fridays! #32: FORMAT
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through FORMAT function in DAX. We will learn how to use pre-formated functions and custom functions to format numbers and dates using DAX. value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! video we will go through the DAX function VALUES. VALES will return a unique value when a table of multiple values is the result of your calculation. value.excerpt: In today's video, we will show you how to comment DAX measures in Power BI. value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
